sentences.en: Alas and alack , we had missed our bus.
sentences.cn: 唉，完了，我们没赶上公共汽车。

sentences.en: Alas, for his own soul, if these were what he sought!
sentences.cn: 假若那里果真有他要我的东西的话,天啊, 让我们为他自己的灵魂哀叹 吧 !
哎呀，事情不是那么简单的。

sentences.en: Alas, my love, I must leave now.
sentences.cn: 哎呀,天哪, 我得走了.

sentences.en: Alas, she knew she was not.
sentences.cn: 唉, 她自己明白不是这么回事.

sentences.en: Alas, they've all sold out, madam.
sentences.cn: 哎呀, 都卖光了, 小姐.
可惜, 不明智的见解却在流行.
唉! 他被癌症夺去了生命.

sentences.en: And then an ecstatic scream of joy; and then, alas!
sentences.cn: 紧接着是欣喜若狂的尖叫, 哎呀!

sentences.en: For many people, alas, hunger is part of everyday life.
sentences.cn: 唉，对很多人来说，挨饿是家常便饭。

sentences.en: Some of them -- alas -- will never return.
sentences.cn: 唉,有一些却是一去不返.

sentences.en: The jasmine sighed, " Alas , " and dropped to the ground.
sentences.cn: 茉莉花 叹息了一声, 落在地上了.

words.tran_cn: 唉（表悲伤、遗憾、恐惧、关切等等）

trans.tran_cn: （表示悲痛、遗憾）哎呀，唉，乌呼，呜呼哀哉
trans.tran_en: used to express sadness, shame, or fear
